item.title: The DJ Beerman Show 14th November
item.description: Helll Yeahhhhhh... Another chance to hear The DJ Beerman Show first broadcast on Top Rock Radio 14th November 2010. Featured bands this week are Vier, Losing All, Thrust n Thrive, Ancient Ascendant and Mortad. Tune in, Turn it up and STAND BACK!!!
item.dc:creator: DJ Beerman
item.itunes:summary: Helll Yeahhhhhh... Another chance to hear The DJ Beerman Show first broadcast on Top Rock Radio 14th November 2010. Featured bands this week are Vier, Losing All, Thrust n Thrive, Ancient Ascendant and Mortad. Tune in, Turn it up and STAND BACK!!!

item.title: The DJ Beerman Show 7th November
item.description: Helll Yeahhhhhh... Another chance to hear The DJ Beerman Show first broadcast on Top Rock Radio 7th November 2010. Featured bands this week are Jeffery Brothers Band, Shadowside, Soul Sanctuary, Lavellion and Trigger. Tune in, Turn it up and STAND BACK!!!

item.title: Imperial Vengeance Interview
